name: tmx
description: A simple-to-use, simple-to-understand, streams-based TMX parser.
readme:
# TMX

A simple-to-use, simple-to-understand, streams-based TMX parser.

## Installation

    npm install tmx

## Usage

    var fs = require('fs')
      , tmx = require('tmx')

    fs.createReadStream('my_map.tmx')
      .pipe(tmx.createParser())
      .pipe(process.stdout)
